subject: College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball (College)
Football (College)
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The use of transfer rules to eliminate many of an athlete’s preferred options illustrates the big-business mind-set of college sports and the control that coaches have over players.
snippet: The use of transfer rules to eliminate many of an athlete’s preferred options illustrates the big-business mind-set of college sports and the control that coaches have over players.
